activities: Collection of personally identifiable information and third party personally identifiable information, data-sensitive files, and storage of personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data submitted by customers to Blue Ribbon Technologies services; Human Resources data; customer data; partner data; supplier data; prospective customer data
privacyprograms: A self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
recoursemech: Blue Ribbon Technologies has selected the American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program) as its independent dispute resolution provider.
